author: Staff Reporter
text:
A moped caught fire as it rammed into a van here on Saturday night.

Pandiyan (18) of Kilipattu village near here was returning in his moped from Vellore. As he was travelling in the road leading to Eesanya Lingam near Anna Arch in Vengikkal he rammed into a van that was proceeding towards Vellore Road.

As a result the moped fell down forcefully and caught fire. However Pandiyan escaped with minor injuries.
title: Moped rams van, catches fire
